contest-event.event-date:
May 8, 1994 D Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest (Premier Section)
Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest (Upper Sections) 10 Entertainments Contest Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest oxfordshire-district-brass-band-associat-3785
None
Cowley Workers' Social Club, Oxford In this first year of running the new 'Premier' section, it was combined with the 'A' section, which only had 2 entries.
Best Instrumentalist: Ian Wright, Euphonium, Unity Brass ('Meditation from Thais') Best Section A Band: East Woodhay
Presentation: 1 Wantage A, 86 2= Morrells Kidlington, 84 2= Brackley & District,84 4= Shipston Town, 83 4= East Woodhay, 83 4= Kennington, 83 7 Unity, 80
Best Percussionist of the Day: Morrells Kidlington Best Tenor Horn of the Day: Morrells Kidlington
March 26, 2013, 11:48 p.m. Sept. 26, 2015, 12:25 p.m.
1 Kidlington Concert Brass Catherine Underwood
2 Oddfellows Brass Robert Boulter
3 Brackley and District Band John Bennett
4 Wantage Silver Band John Winterflood
5 Shipston Town Band Les Yarrow
6 East Woodhay Silver James Brown
7 Kennington (Oxford) Ron Sudworth
